text: @nard_nigeria @MBuhari @Fmohnigeria @LabourMinNG @208_nigeria I remember when @Fmohnigeria @NGRPresident claimed they were inviting Chinese doctors&other health workers concerning fight against covid19 and @nard_nigeria kicked against it . Here we are today........ Nig government,LIARS, shame on you
